intent_atoms.description: All prior in-progress notes for the macOS 1 GiB lenient-versus-strict benchmark must be archived under DOCS/TASK_ARCHIVE/207_Summary_of_Work_2025-11-04_macOS_Benchmark_Block/.

functional_units.name: CLI Corruption Summary Output
functional_units.description: Provides tolerant-mode corruption summary lines in the isoinspect inspect command, including severity counts and deepest affected depth from ParseIssueStore; documented in DocC and tested via CLI scaffold tests for tolerant and strict modes.
